U

UpdateAppointment(Appointments) - Static method in class DAO.AppointmentsDAO
Called when the user makes edits to an Appointment and clicks the Save Records button, the SQL Query updates the Appointment entry based on its corresponding ID number.
UpdateCustomer(Customers) - Static method in class DAO.CustomersDAO
Called when the user makes edits to a Customer and clicks the Save Records button, the SQL Query updates the Customer entry based on its corresponding ID number.
userRetrieval(int) - Method in class DAO.UsersDAO
This method calls the SQL Query that selects a User that matches the given User_ID.
Users - Class in model
Users Model class that handles the logic and attributes of the scheduler user for the Login page.
Users() - Constructor for class model.Users
Constructor used for the Appointments page looking up a specific User.
Users(int, String, String, Date, String, Timestamp, String) - Constructor for class model.Users
 
UsersDAO - Class in DAO
Users DAO class that handles the SQL C.R.U.D logic for the given Users in the Scheduler's database.
UsersDAO() - Constructor for class DAO.UsersDAO
 
UTCConverter - Class in util
Util class that converts the scheduler time to UTC Form.
UTCConverter() - Constructor for class util.UTCConverter
 
UTCToLDTConverter(String) - Static method in class util.UTCConverter
Converts the scheduler time to UTC, and then finally out as LocalDateTime.
util - package util
